drugs.name: Adalimumab
drugs.description: Sold under the trade name Humira among others, is a medication used to treat rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, Crohn's disease, ulcerative colitis, chronic psoriasis, hidradenitis suppurativa, and juvenile idiopathic arthritis.

drugs.name: Etanercept
drugs.description: Is a biopharmaceutical that treats autoimmune diseases by interfering with tumor necrosis factor (TNF, a soluble inflammatory cytokine) by acting as a TNF inhibitor.

drugs.name: Infliximab
drugs.description: Is a chimeric monoclonal antibody biologic drug that works against tumor necrosis factor alpha (TNF-Î±) and is used to treat autoimmune diseases.

drugs.name: Rituximab
drugs.description: Sold under the brand name Rituxan among others, is a medication used to treat certain autoimmune diseases and types of cancer.

drugs.name: Insulin glargine
drugs.description: Marketed under the names Lantus, among others, is a long-acting basal insulin analogue, given once daily to help control the blood sugar level of those with diabetes.
